name: Hachi's Moonlit Training
description:
Hachi hones her skills!

Press spacebar to cut as rocks touch the white line!

If you believe the hit detection may be off, try the downloadable version instead!

Art by the wonderful @CaptAnaugi on Twitter!

https://twitter.com/CaptAnaugi

Checkout Hachimitsu's ongoing comic!

https://tapas.io/series/Hachimitsu/info
